org.pikater.web.sharedresources.download

Interface IDownloadResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRegistrarResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileDownloadResource, ImageDownloadResource

    public interface IDownloadResource
extends IRegistrarResource
    An interface which every downloadable resource (DynamicDownloadServlet must implement. Nothing else is strictly required.
    Author:
    SkyCrawl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFilename()
      Returns the future filename of this resource on the client's machine.
      java.lang.String getMimeType()
      Returns the mime type of this resource.
      long getSize()
      Returns the size of the resource.
      java.io.InputStream getStream()
      Returns a binary stream of the resource.
